Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Connector corrosion causing signal degradation. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 29/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
